name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"06c23c31-b4c5-4976-bd8d-7c3bbe115dd2","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: convert","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"402c3a48-57df-41a3-9953-2810adc2774b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"convert","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is an intermediate resolution utility that transforms a namespace string into a set of all reachable concrete definitions or type tags. It uses an internal Breadth-First Search (BFS/DFS logic) to traverse chains of references, effectively unwinding variables that point to other variables. It ensures that the analyzer looks past temporary identifiers to find every possible terminal value (like a specific class, function, or literal type) that a namespace could represent at the current point in the analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"62441079-1e82-4853-aae0-0019c6cff3a1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis in Python must handle high levels of indirection. A variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"result","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" might point to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which points to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which was finally assigned an integer. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"convert","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the engine that follows this trail to the end. Unlike a simple lookup, it is "path-aware"—it checks the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to see if the variable was modified within the current conditional scope, ensuring that the resolved values reflect the most accurate state of the program.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"10b8ddbd-5364-467e-a060-12e67ad7ef07","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"15ae1400-2c8f-4e23-82aa-65bec4064990","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Direct Type Check:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the input is already a base type tag (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it returns it immediately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"966dc0c6-763c-47d5-a992-97e646dd908c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Breadth-First Resolution (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"dfs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It initiates a traversal to follow pointers.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"15f88b48-793e-47b1-ad7c-ef463e067d40","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It maintains a queue of namespaces to resolve and a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visited","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" set to prevent infinite loops.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"04866f78-9bf4-4517-aaad-25dc68aec6ed","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For each namespace, it retrieves the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". If the definition is a "pointer" (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PARAM_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it adds all the values that variable "points to" into the queue.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2442f738-ecab-483a-a230-a37c693f1b42","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If it hits a terminal type (like a Class or literal definition), it records the concrete type tag.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"a2ca664f-c3ac-4262-ba65-c58977e6fcc8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope-Specific Overrides:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It queries the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"change_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for the current scope. If a variable has a "deferred change" (e.g., an assignment inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block that hasn't been globally committed yet), it incorporates those potential values into the resolution set.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7b72e6ae-e8d6-4ed4-aeab-d0c7a8eabf70","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Deduplication:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns a unique list of all concrete namespaces and type tags discovered during the traversal.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9c97ba6f-98e8-4cc4-8163-cfab28bcf5b5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Consider: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = 10; y = x; z = y","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"866d41a5-62cd-4926-8180-18e7c317be21","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"convert","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"z","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c0b0c2bd-6a44-4b59-96f1-0487dc50682c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dfs","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" logic sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"z","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" points to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bdbd394c-4c30-4cb8-b533-3718fac0c6ab","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It then sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" points to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"616963e9-1bae-4206-8cac-39bed0143037","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It finally sees ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" points to a literal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"INT_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7fd70566-a7f7-423d-872e-80560150ef0f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["<int>"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was also assigned ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""hello"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block, it would return ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["<int>", "<str>"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"44f3eab7-f0a8-476d-a372-c46cbd846dbf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
